conbody.p: Each glossary topicDITA glossary defines a single sense of one term. Besides identifying the term and providing a definition, the topic can identify related terms. The glossary is a specialization of the concept topic.

To create a glossary, you can do one of the following:
Reference the glossary topics in a map.
Group multiple glossary entries together in a single document under a container topic using the ditabase document type.
